reviews.customers_say: Customers like the outfit's color, quality, comfort, and warmth, with one noting it feels like a warm hug.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fit.
items.body: The feel, color, fit, everything was perfect! Received many compliments! Read more
items.author: Margie S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy versatile outfit!
items.body: I’m not a skirt person so I surprised myself by ordering this set. When I received it, I was concerned by how wrinkled it was (I’m super over clothes that need a lot of ironing and steaming). I thought I’d pass the iron over it before taking off the tags and it very easily unwrinkled. I wasn’t impressed with the texture at first— I was worried it’d be scratchy, but it’s been fine. I haven’t really worn the set without other layers underneath. It’s thick and stretchy, making for a really comfortable, warm, put-together outfit. I’ve paired with sneaks, booties, flats, it’s very versatile. I’ve worn each piece separately as well. I washed it and hung it to dry. It remains unwrinkled and such a no brainer option for me. Also, it doesn’t get stretched out and misshapen as the day goes on. I’ve worn it twice before washing it. For reference, I’m 5’7” and slim athletic build. I ordered a small in black. The sleeves fit perfectly (which is a struggle for me when purchasing smalls). The skirt is fitted, flattering, not too tight and falls straight and lands about mid calf. Read more
items.author: Crysmo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly Surprised
items.body: I was surprised by the quality of this set - it’s soft and kept its shape during wear. I’ve washed on delicate cycle (air dryed) and it still looks good. It is not thin material - love that the pieces can be worn as separates as well. Read more
items.author: Amanda B Little

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable!
items.body: Super comfy and can wear as separates. I'm 5'1", size 4. Ordered a small and it fit great. Love PrettyGarden clothes. Read more
items.author: steve lowman

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap material and cheaply made
items.body: The material was harsh and scratchy and too thin. The fit was small and disproportionate. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Top ran bigger than skirt
items.body: I'm 5'7" and 165. I got the xl. I followed the chart regarding sizing. The skirt is fitted perfectly but the top looks like a cheap sweatshirt. And it's huge compared to the skirt. If the top didn't have that sweatshirt type banding at the bottom it would have been doable. The material is thick and seemed a little rough when I unpacked it but the knit was actually warm and surprisingly comfy. The camel color is very nice. But that top looked awful. I'd need a much smaller size for the top so I'm returning it Read more
items.author: Vee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size. Soft and pretty!
items.author: Alyssa Millen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my outfit!
items.body: Love my outfit. I preferred it in black. It’s true to size and fits exactly how I expected, based on the reviews I saw. I ordered a pair of boots to wear with this outfit. I will definitely purchase this outfit in other colors. You won’t be disappointed. Update: very comfy. Wasn’t itchy or hot. I will definitely order in another color. Read more
items.author: RL Danso

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, Khaki, Beige, Grey Blue, Black, Coffee, Rust Red, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
